mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that powerful tools should be accessible to everyone, everywhere, without compromising privacy or requiring expensive software.
mission.goal: Toolkit Lab was created to provide a free, fast, and privacy-focused suite of web tools. No installation required, everything runs in your browser.

private.title: 100% Private
private.description: Your files never leave your device. All processing (conversion, editing, transfer) happens locally in your browser.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: No upload/download delays. Processing starts instantly and runs at full speed on your hardware using WebAssembly.

offline.title: Client-Side Processing
offline.description: All data is processed locally on your device. Your files never leave your browser, ensuring maximum privacy.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: Built with modern web technologies: React, TypeScript, WebAssembly, and WebRTC. We believe in transparent development.

free_forever.title: Free Forever
free_forever.description: This tool is and will always be 100% free. We believe in democratizing access to powerful tools. Our service is supported by non-intrusive advertisements.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have feedback, suggestions, or found a bug? We'd love to hear from you!

scouter.title: Net Scouter
scouter.desc: Professional diagnostic tools beyond simple speed tests. Visualize Jitter (latency oscillation) in real-time and analyze line quality optimized for gamers and streamers.
scouter.point1: Measurement of Bufferbloat using parallel communication
scouter.point2: VPN safety check with WebRTC leak detection

gif.title: GIF Converter
gif.desc: Ultimate high-speed GIF conversion without using servers. Unleash the power of your device and transform video material into high-quality animation instantly.
gif.point2: Full control over trimming, cropping, and speed adjustments

vision.title: Privacy-First Vision
vision.desc: 'Your data never leaves your hands.' Toolkit Lab continues to prove that convenience and privacy can coexist.

developer_note.title: Developer's Message
developer_note.quote: "If you can imagine it, you can build it."
developer_note.p1: The rapid evolution of AI technology has brought us into an era where this is no longer a dream but a reality. Whenever I throw a sudden idea at AI, it responds with a confident 'It’s possible.' This endless cycle of creative inspiration is the foundation of Toolkit Lab.
developer_note.p2: While AI can be incredibly brilliant, it can also be surprisingly clunky. To truly master AI, one needs flexibility and that uniquely human 'out-of-the-box' thinking. When given the right spark—the right prompt—it takes flight on the wings of imagination. (Though it crashes occasionally... which only adds to its charm.)

products.title: Featured Insights:
products.prompt_pro: Prompt Pro: Originally a simple prompt refiner, it evolved into a system that delivers results directly. I've integrated personas inspired by legendary engineers to provide philosophical responses.
products.warp_share: Warp Share & Net Scouter: These are the distillation of high-level engineering. Warp Share offers seamless file transfers, while Net Scouter visualizes network health in real-time. Technologies that push the limits of web development.

developer_note.footer: As long as time permits, I will continue to develop products that add a touch of convenience and excitement to your life.
developer_note.author: Developer: kazamochi
